name: Hit or Block
description:
This is a simple 2D game that you can decide whether you want to move up or down the wall gate to pass through or block the cannonball to hit or protect the target. 

Features:

  • Simple Instructions
  • Simple graphics
  • Maximum 2 minutes of game play in each level
  • Record your high score in each level
  • Able to play in PC (only on Windows & Mac) and Android

Credits:

  • Assets & textures
    • https://opengameart.org
    • https://www.textures.com
    • https://www.freepik.com
  • Fonts
    • https://fonts.google.com
  • Sound effects
    • https://www.freesoundeffects.com
    • http://soundbible.com

Game engine:

  • Godot
